text: E'ina nehazanagi ha' vahe kazinkante tamavrentesnuge'za, ha' vahe'mo'za tamazeri pri huza bainati kazinteti tamahegahaze. Na'ankure nagrama kezamatuana nagri kea antahita nona nosuta, kema tamasamuana, nagri kea antahi so'ea osu'naze. Ana nehuta nagri navurera havi tamavu tamavaza nehuta, nagri'ma nave'nosia avu'avaza amage ante'naze.
